item.title: Create a keyboard interface to the web
item.description: PostEdit: The roadmap to create a vi-like browser extension from scratch, from experimenting things in the console to native and cross-extension messaging. The first version of Krabby ðŸ¦€. This post is written for Chrome, but can be adapted to the browser of your liking. Configuration and default shortcuts for Chrome Configuration and default shortcuts for Firefox Configuration and default shortcuts for surf Demos Krabby Try It Make sure to deactivate your extension and browser bindings.
